conversation.content: Um, hi there, I'm so, uh... let me see here... I really need help. So grateful someone picked up.
Hey there! That's interesting, let me pull up... what's happening with verification?
Right, okay so... hmm, I'm the, uh, athletic trainer? For State. And we're just... constantly moving.
Oh that's... um, that's actually pretty unusual. So you're, uh, having trouble with the callbacks? Your account ID, er, would be starting with ATH-7264 if you're institutional...
Yes! ATH... wait. Seven-two... six-four? That sounds right. You get it.
Hmm, so, um, let me think here... you're traveling and, uh, missing our verification calls? That's... er, that's weird because we usually...
Exactly. Thank you. Three weeks now. Bus. Hotel. Game. Bus. No chance.
Okay so, um, this is interesting... I'm seeing, uh, twelve attempted calls to your number ending in 8847? And they're all, er, during what looks like...
Eight-eight-four... no. Seven. Four-seven. But yes. Twelve sounds right.
Right right, um, 8847, sorry. So here's what's, uh, happening... the system's trying to reach you, um, between 2 and 4 PM Eastern, which is probably when you're...
Oh! Hmm, that's... let me think... um, that's literally, uh, practice time. Every day. Always on field.
That's the puzzle piece! Okay so... wait, this is actually fixable. Your verification code VRF-92847-TM just needs...
Wait so... um, VRF-nine... hmm, what if I just... I don't, uh, really understand how...
No no, you don't need that code. That's our side. Here's what we do... text verification instead. To that 8847 number.
Oh my... um, you can DO that? That's so, uh... I mean, that's incredibly helpful. Really. Thank you.
Yeah! Been doing this eight years. Athletic departments always have this issue. Let me just update your preference flag to TXT-ONLY...
So specific. Um, I just... hmm, nobody else, uh, even understood the problem. You just... got it.
There we go. Updated. You'll get a text in about... thirty seconds actually. Confirmation code CNF-44872-SP.
Got it! Just came through. This is... perfect. Solved everything.
Beautiful! That code's good for 72 hours. Even from the bus. We're all set here.
